title: (x) Nova Home Loans - Trajan {David Hamuel}
content:
Hey, I was wondering if anyone could tell what font the word nova was set in?  
Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018063652im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Nova%20Homes%20Logo_4887.jpg)
author: pantone354

comments.content: Hello, I was wondering if anyone could please help me identify the font used on this website.. [http://www.lulamag.com/main.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018063652/http:/www.lulamag.com/main.html "http://www.lulamag.com/main.html") Thanks :)

Trajan

BTW, the right place is [http://typophile.com/forum/29](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018063652/http:/typophile.com/forum/29 "http://typophile.com/forum/29")
wow, how did I miss that. Thanks David
Sorry pantone354, I didn't mean to ask my question in your forum topic.
